snippet: Tony Bellew broke his right hand in the early stages of his heavyweight victory over David Haye, who ruptured his right Achilles tendon....

headline.main: North Korea Fires Four Ballistic Missiles Into Sea Near Japan
headline.print_headline: North Korea Fires Four Ballistic Missiles Into Sea Near Japan

lead_paragraph: Tony Bellew broke his right hand in the early stages of his heavyweight victory over David Haye, who ruptured his right Achilles tendon.
